1�Don't move a muscle...
1�How much do you know?
1�If you dig any deeper, I'll bury you rrright here.
1�Hmph, so you're gonna play it that way?
1�Fine. You're as good as dead, anyway.Why don't I thrrrow you a bone?
1�As you've prrrobably already found out, I'm not a citizen of Aht Urhgan. My home is the island nation of Tsahya.
1�The Empire has several vassal states, and Tsahya is one of them...
1�It may be subject to Imperial law, but Tsahya has been grrranted autonomy and is allowed to field an independent defense force.
1�We have an Imperial governor-general, and our people are grrranted the same rights as Imperial citizens. Or at least, so the law says...
1�My family was a wealthy farming household that rrraised popotoes--one of the staples of our nation's diet.
1�Then one day, a new agricultural land law was passed by the governor-general that put my family in the poorhouse. Almost all of our property was seized by the Empire...
1�My life changed suddenly and completely.All I could think about was where my next meal was coming from...
1�And the final kick in the guts was when the entire village was forced to switch their crops from popotoes to pamamas because of some new crrraze in Al Zahbi.

1�The thing is, none of the villagers were used to raising fruit...and the entire plantation withered before the first harvest.With no food, or money to import supplies, many people died of starvation. Including my own mother...
1�With no home and no family, I did whatever it took to stay alive.Every day was a strrruggle.
1�Then, when I was thirteen, I lied about my age and enlisted in the Tsahyan Self-Defense Force--mostly because I'd heard they fed you prrroperly.
1�But it was like I had trrraded one hell for another.Once they found out I was only thirteen, I was forced to join the ��Tsahyan Freedom Fighters,�� a covert unit kept secret from the Empire.
1�This was the dark face of the Tsahyan Self-Defense Force--a special forces unit that trrrained assassins as the ultimate weapons in the plan to secure true independence for our nation.
1�I was officially rrreported as deceased, and then came the unending days of assassination training. And once I had learned everything they had to teach me...
1�The Freedom Fighters prepared a false identity for me as Mihli, the Tsahyan philosophy student, and sent me to Walahra Temple.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Get the Picture.An Empty Vessel(pt.1).An Empty Vessel(pt.2).What Friends Are For(pt.1).What Friends Are For(pt.2).Omens.Finders Keepers(pt.1).Finders Keepers(pt.2).Bastion of Knowledge.Soothing Waters.The Revelation(pt.1).The Revelation(pt.2).The Revelation(pt.3).The Revelation(pt.4).The Revelation(pt.5).The Revelation(pt.6).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Ah...The new potential...
1�I am Yasfel of the Immortals.
1�I regret to inform you that the #���� you have brought me was nothing more than a ruse.
1�We merely wished to test the limits of your innermost desire for power.
1�Yes...We needed to gauge your ��suitability��...
1�You undertook what was, in essence, an unreasonable request, and completed the task admirably.Such commitment is worthy of praise...
1�But it all comes back to your search for power...
1�I stand before you as one who holds the only key to unlocking your potential.
1�Naturally, this power comes at a price.Something precious will be lost to you.
1�Though you may not even notice it is missing...
1�If you are willing to pay the price...6If you truly desire the power that a blue mage wields...
1�Take my hand...
1�Take his hand?Yes.I don't think so...
1�Do you truly take his hand?Yes!I've changed my mind.
1�Your life...6...now belongs to the Empress and the Empire...
1�You choose the safer path.So be it...
1�I will ask you one more question.6Do you feel any regrets in your decision?
1�Any regrets?None.Maybe...
1�No regrets at all?None!Wait!
1�This was all nothing more than an unrealized dream.6Return...Return to your safe, familiar world...
1��[His/Her] cobalt levels were very low, and I was afraid this would be another failure. But �[he/she] somehow clawed �[his/her] way back from the edge of death.
1�Hmph. �[His/Her] answers were not entirely truthful.
1�You were the one who transplanted this!
1�This...6...loathsome Ahriman lens!
1�Hold your tongues.�[He/She] awakens.
1�However, at this moment you are but an empty vessel--a base creature, weaker than the most ordinary mortal.
1�A blue mage must wrest �[his/her] strength and vitality from �[his/her] enemies.
1�Show me your hunger for unrivaled power!
1�This is the only guidance I shall give you.
1�If you prove your worth, you may one day find a place among the Immortals.
1�  sets the 3���� on the groun
d.�Hooo�`! What is this wooonderful wooonderful smell?
1�Nooone here?...Is here?...Nooo here?
1�Nooo here, hohoho!6Stooo from the roooins...for Wawaroon! Time for a feast!
1�Ack...ghmph?
1�You rummage through Wawaroon's bag...
1�At least he is still breathing.
1�Ahummm...
1�What!? What do you want!?How can I concentrate with you blathering in my ear!
1�<Groan...>I was so close to attuning myself to Aydeewa...All my effort has come to naught, thanks to you!What do you have to say for yourself!? Huh!?
1�Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...
1�This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.
1�Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!
1�Why do ghosts say ��boo,�� anyway?
1�I heard that going to a dark, scary dungeon is the best way to test your courage.This place definitely qualifies, kupo!
1�Maybe I'm doing something wrong, kupo?
1�If it gets out that I haven't scared the wits out of a single person yet, I'm going to get into trouble, kupo...

1�Within the nation lived a great individual, one who created numerous items and vehicles powered by lightning.
1�Thanks to those wondrous inventions, their civilization developed way beyond that of the surrounding nations.
